SEARCH
Package com.Software.FitnessSystem.AdminControllers

Class SubscriptionPlan

java.lang.Object
com.Software.FitnessSystem.AdminControllers.SubscriptionPlan
public class SubscriptionPlan extends Object
Represents a subscription plan in the fitness system. It includes predefined plan types and support for dynamic custom plans.
Author:
Muath Hassoun

      public CustomPlan getPlanType()
      Retrieves the custom plan associated with this subscription.
      Returns:
      the custom plan.

    • setPlanType

      public void setPlanType(CustomPlan planType)
      Sets the custom plan for this subscription.
      Parameters:
      planType - the custom plan to be set.

    • convertFromPlanTypeToCustomPlan

      public static void convertFromPlanTypeToCustomPlan()
      Converts predefined PlanType values into CustomPlan instances and adds them to the dynamic plans map. If a predefined plan is not already in the dynamic plans map, it will be added.

    • addDynamicPlan

      public static void addDynamicPlan(String name, double price, int duration, String description)
      Adds a dynamic plan to the subscription plans map.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the plan.
      price - the price of the plan.
      duration - the duration of the plan in days.
      description - the description of the plan.

    • toString

      Returns a string representation of the subscription plan.

      Returns:
